mapper.insert: insert into vendor(VENDOR_NUM , VENDOR_ID , VENDOR_PASSWORD , VENDOR_NAME, REGISTRATION_NUMBER, REPRESENTATIVE_NAME, VENDOR_MAIN_IMAGE, VENDOR_ADDRESS,VENDOR_ADDRESS_DETAIL ,VENDOR_POSTCODE, CATEGORY, VENDOR_PHONE, VENDOR_EMAIL) values(#{vendorNum }, #{vendorId}, #{vendorPassword}, #{vendorName}, #{registrationNumber}, #{representativeName}, null, #{vendorAddress},#{vendorAddressDetail}, #{vendorPostcode}, #{category}, #{vendorPhone}, #{vendorEmail})
